translation.it: bussarono a ogni porta nel raggio di 16 km. "Dov'era quella notte

translation.it: tra le 00:00 e le 4:00?"

translation.it: Ricordo che vennero a casa mia un paio di ragazzi di Bantry.

translation.en: Unless something happens specifically, most people would find it quite difficult
translation.it: A meno che non succeda qualcosa di particolare per i più sarà difficile

translation.en: to tell you minute by minute, "What were you doing?"
translation.it: fare un resoconto minuto per minuto.

translation.it: Se vogliono parlarmi, che facciano pure.

translation.it: A meno che non si abbia una memoria fotografica.

translation.it: Se dici la verità,

translation.it: non hai problemi.

translation.it: Se nascondi qualcosa, menti.

translation.it: Quando gli agenti della Garda mi interrogarono,

translation.it: mi mostrarono una foto di Sophie

translation.en: and they said what did I think of this woman.
translation.it: e mi chiesero cosa ne pensassi.

translation.it: Dissi: "Sì, una bella donna".

translation.it: "No, ma per lei era lesbica?"

translation.it: Rimasi un po' perplessa.

translation.en: I thought, "Is there any possibility that this monster was some lesbian?"
translation.it: Mi chiesi: "È possibile che questo mostro sia una lesbica?"

translation.it: C'era un tipo del posto che era solito spiare le donne

translation.it: e rubare bombole di gas.

translation.it: A quanto pare, andava in giro a rubare bombole di gas.

translation.en: He was a small bit…
translation.it: Era un po'…

translation.en: What's the word? He was a bit odd, the poor fella.
translation.it: Come si dice? Era un po' strano, poverino.

translation.en: It threw up all types of people like that.
translation.it: Vennero a galla queste persone.

translation.it: Gente che si comportava in modo insolito.

translation.en: They've interviewed about a thousand people. They say…
translation.it: Hanno interrogato un migliaio di persone. Dicono…

translation.it: C'erano tantissime informazioni.

translation.it: Inizialmente, la Garda identificò 54 sospettati.

translation.it: Questi si ridussero rapidamente a dieci e furono scartati velocemente.

translation.it: …gli investigatori, capitanati dal Sovrintendente capo Dermot Dwyer.

translation.it: L'indagine è stata presa molto sul serio.

translation.en: [Ian] I was writing stories for the local papers
translation.it: Scrivevo per i giornali locali

translation.en: and one of the national papers.
translation.it: e per un giornale nazionale.

translation.en: There was one story I picked up.
translation.it: Seguii questa storia.

translation.en: A lady who lives at Three Castle Head called Yvonne Ungerer
translation.it: Una signora di nome Yvonne Ungerer che viveva a Three Castle Head

translation.en: told me she had had a visit from the victim on the Sunday before
translation.it: disse che la vittima era andata a casa sua la domenica precedente

translation.en: and that… that Madame du Plantier said that she'd had this really very strange experience.
translation.it: e che la sig.ra du Plantier le aveva detto di aver avuto un'esperienza strana.

translation.en: [Wassell] There's a ruined castle
translation.it: Ci sono le rovine di un castello

translation.en: on Three Castle Head.
translation.it: a Three Castle Head.

translation.en: [in French] There she saw something terrible,
translation.it: Lì vide qualcosa di terrificante

translation.en: and it scared her.
translation.it: che la spaventò.

translation.en: [Frédéric] And she felt
translation.it: E provò…

translation.en: terrible fear.
translation.it: una paura terribile.

translation.en: [Marie-Madeleine] She arrived at the Ungerers' house really scared,
translation.it: Quando giunse dagli Ungerer, era molto impaurita

translation.en: saying, "Oh my God, I saw a woman."
translation.it: e disse: "Oddio, ho visto una donna".

translation.en: Like a white shape.
translation.it: Come una silhouette bianca.

translation.en: [Wassell in English] Three Castle Head is meant to be haunted by a melancholy female ghost.
translation.it: Three Castle Head sarebbe infestato dal fantasma di una donna malinconica.

translation.en: The White Lady.
translation.it: La Dama bianca.

translation.en: [Frédéric in French] I learned this story about this lady,
translation.it: Si racconta la storia di questa dama,

translation.en: this mythological, legendary character who lives at this place on the lake.
translation.it: un personaggio mitologico e leggendario, che vive in questa dimora sul lago.

translation.en: And when you see her,
translation.it: E se la vedi,

translation.en: it means you are going to die in the hours that follow.
translation.it: significa che morirai nelle ore a seguire.

translation.en: [Marie-Madeleine] She didn't go to an Irish person's house.
translation.it: Non bussò alla casa di un irlandese.

translation.en: An Irish person would never have let her leave.
translation.it: Un irlandese non l'avrebbe mai lasciata andare via.

translation.en: [Wassell in English] If they'd known the legend, they wouldn't have let her go home.
translation.it: Se avessero conosciuto la leggenda, non l'avrebbero lasciata andare a casa.

translation.en: But they didn't know.
translation.it: Ma non la conoscevano.

translation.en: [Bertrand in French] I remember when we arrived in Ireland.
translation.it: Quando arrivammo in Irlanda, ci ritrovammo in un hotel a Cork

translation.en: We found ourselves in Cork, in a hotel,
translation.it: ci ritrovammo in un hotel a Cork

translation.en: on 25th December.
translation.it: il 25 dicembre.

translation.en: [Bertrand] All the Irish families were together celebrating Christmas.
translation.it: Tutte le famiglie irlandesi festeggiavano il Natale.

translation.en: I think it was the morning of the 26th
translation.it: Credo che fosse la mattina del 26

translation.en: that they called me and said, "You can come and see the body."
translation.it: quando mi chiamarono e mi dissero che potevo vedere il corpo.

translation.en: A big room, the morgue.
translation.it: Una stanza grande, l'obitorio.

translation.en: You cross the room. You see a coffin at the end.
translation.it: Attraversai la stanza. Vidi una bara in fondo.

translation.en: You have to breathe.
translation.it: Respirai.

translation.en: You have to catch your breath and tell yourself, "Here we go."
translation.it: Dovetti riprendere fiato e dirmi: "Forza".

translation.en: And the first time I saw Sophie, I didn't recognise her.
translation.it: La prima volta che vidi Sophie, non la riconobbi.

translation.en: Uh… I didn't. It wasn't her.
translation.it: Non era lei.

translation.en: What I noticed was her hands. And that her hands were so…
translation.it: Le sue mani mi balzarono subito agli occhi.

translation.en: Thank God my sister didn't see her hands.
translation.it: Grazie a Dio mia sorella non le vide.

translation.en: [Georges] We were able to see Sophie's body.
translation.it: Ci permisero di vedere il cadavere.

translation.en: [voice catches] Marguerite…
translation.it: Marguerite…

translation.en: saw her.
translation.it: la vide.

translation.en: She… she kissed her,
translation.it: la baciò,

translation.it: ma disse: "Questa non è mia figlia".

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.it: Mi dispiace.

translation.it: Ai posti. Pronti…

translation.it: - Va… - Vai bene.

translation.it: …il caso di omicidio è ancora aperto perché…

translation.en: I'm sorry, everyone. I lost my eyeline.
translation.it: Scusate, ho spostato lo sguardo.

translation.en: [Florence] I can remember journalists from all walks of life.
translation.it: C'erano giornalisti di ogni tipo.

translation.en: The media were very visible.
translation.it: I media erano molto presenti.

translation.en: [Daniel in French] I went to Schull five or six days after the murder.
translation.it: RTL, CORRISPONDENTE DALL'IRLANDA Andai a Schull cinque o sei giorni dopo l'omicidio.

translation.en: When journalists go somewhere new,
translation.it: Quando i giornalisti vanno in un posto nuovo,

translation.en: they go and see the local journalists.
translation.it: contattano i colleghi del luogo.

translation.en: A colleague called Eddie Cassidy told me,
translation.it: Un collega di nome Eddie Cassidy mi disse:

translation.en: "Ask for Ian Bailey."
translation.it: "Chiedi di Ian Bailey."

translation.en: [Ian in English] Because I was a local correspondent, the French press came in, came to me,
translation.it: Essendo un corrispondente locale, la stampa francese si rivolse a me,

translation.en: and various other news organisations.
translation.it: così come altre testate giornalistiche.

translation.en: [Daniel in French] He was clearly the best-informed journalist on the scene.
translation.it: Era chiaramente il giornalista più informato sul posto.

translation.en: He told me a little of what he knew.
translation.it: Mi raccontò un po' di ciò che sapeva.

translation.en: He was extremely nice. Very helpful.
translation.it: Fu molto gentile e disponibile.

translation.en: [Ian in English] In another life, I was an investigative journalist in Britain.
translation.it: Ero stato un giornalista d'inchiesta in Gran Bretagna e trattavo casi scabrosi.

translation.en: I did a lot of sensitive stuff.
translation.it: e trattavo casi scabrosi.

translation.en: I worked for The Sunday Times' Insight Team on stories to do with GCHQ.
translation.it: Lavorai nel team specializzato del Sunday Times sui servizi segreti.

translation.en: [in French] Suddenly, he found himself in the middle of a phenomenal story
translation.it: All'improvviso, si ritrovò nel mezzo di una storia fenomenale

translation.en: in a place where nothing ever happens.
translation.it: in un posto dove non succede mai niente.

translation.en: [in English] From my point of view, uh…
translation.it: Personalmente,

translation.en: I was being very busy as an active freelance journalist.
translation.it: ero molto impegnato come giornalista freelance.

translation.en: Writing articles, trying to make a living for myself.
translation.it: Scrivere articoli, cercare di guadagnarmi da vivere.

translation.en: I was picking up things in Schull,
translation.it: Raccoglievo informazioni a Schull,

translation.en: getting on with my job as an investigative journalist.
translation.it: facevo il mio lavoro di giornalista d'inchiesta.

translation.en: [Daniel in French] He said, "Ask your French colleagues
translation.it: Disse: "Chiedi ai tuoi colleghi francesi di indagare

translation.en: to investigate Sophie Toscan du Plantier's life."
translation.it: sulla vita di Sophie Toscan du Plantier".

translation.en: [Ian in English] I genuinely felt that there was somebody in France
translation.it: Ebbi la sensazione che qualcuno in Francia

translation.en: who had a vested interest in this.
translation.it: avesse degli interessi personali.

translation.en: She's part of the French show business, so I think it's fascinating people.
translation.it: Fa parte dello show business francese, ciò affascina le persone.

translation.en: [Ian] But you can think something. Can you prove it?
translation.it: È legittimo avere delle ipotesi. Ma si possono dimostrare?

translation.en: [reporter 23] Sophie du Plantier was married to a top French film producer.
translation.it: Sophie du Plantier era sposata con un noto produttore francese.

translation.en: The couple were among the social elite in Paris.
translation.it: La coppia apparteneva all'élite parigina.

translation.en: [in French] Daniel was a very big producer.
translation.it: Daniel era un produttore conosciuto.

translation.en: [Frédéric] He had produced for lots of big directors.
translation.it: Aveva lavorato con molti registi.

translation.en: More than that, he was the embodiment of French cinema.
translation.it: Ma soprattutto rappresentava il cinema francese.

translation.en: He'd studied classics, Latin and Greek, so he was very cultured.
translation.it: Aveva fatto studi classici, latino e greco antico, era molto erudito.

translation.en: [Frédéric] He'd been the director of the biggest French studio.
translation.it: Era stato il direttore del più grande studio francese.

translation.en: He was a public figure.
translation.it: Era un personaggio pubblico.

translation.en: You would see him on TV.
translation.it: Andava in televisione.

translation.en: …opera every 100 years, so this will be the last…
translation.it: …un'opera ogni 100 anni, quindi sarà l'ultima…

translation.en: [Frédéric] I've rarely met anyone so brilliant, so eloquent.
translation.it: Raramente ho conosciuto qualcuno così brillante ed eloquente.

translation.en: [man 9] Daniel Toscan du Plantier was very well-known.
translation.it: Daniel Toscan du Plantier era molto noto.

translation.en: He knew Jacques Chirac well,
translation.it: Conosceva bene Jacques Chirac,

translation.en: who was the president of France at the time.
translation.it: che, all'epoca, era il Presidente della Repubblica francese.

translation.en: So he was very high-profile in France.
translation.it: Quindi era molto famoso in Francia.

translation.en: [Frédéric] But I had the impression that there were two Daniels.
translation.it: Ma avevo l'impressione che ci fossero due Daniel.

translation.en: That when the curtain fell, he was much more switched off,
translation.it: Quando si abbassava il sipario era molto più spento,

translation.en: much more anxious, and quite silent.
translation.it: molto più ansioso e silenzioso.

translation.en: I knew that Daniel had financial problems, that he wasn't in an easy situation.
translation.it: Sapevo che Daniel aveva problemi finanziari, era in una posizione difficile.

translation.en: [Marie-Madeleine] When she died…
translation.it: Quando lei morì,

translation.en: [in English] …Daniel said, "Don't speak to anybody." "I don't want to receive any journalists."
translation.it: Daniel disse: "Non parlare con nessuno. Non voglio parlare coi giornalisti.

translation.en: "I want to block everything."
translation.it: Voglio bloccare tutto fuori".

translation.en: And people thought, "Why did Daniel do that?"
translation.it: La gente si chiese perché lo fece.

translation.en: [in French] He didn't go to Ireland to identify the body. It was the family.
translation.it: Non andò in Irlanda per identificare il corpo. Lo fece la famiglia.

translation.en: We don't really know why he didn't come,
translation.it: Non sappiamo perché non sia venuto,

translation.en: but it was extremely surprising.
translation.it: ma ne fummo sorpresi.

translation.en: When you find out that your wife has been murdered, you go and deal with it.
translation.it: Quando scopri che hanno assassinato tua moglie, fai qualcosa.

translation.en: [reporter 24] The people of Southwest Cork remain baffled.
translation.it: Nel Cork sud-occidentale sono tutti perplessi.

translation.en: The Gardaí still await a break.
translation.it: Mente la Garda attende ancora una svolta.

translation.en: [Barry] On 27th December,
translation.it: Il 27 dicembre,

translation.en: this woman called Marie Farrell
translation.it: questa donna di nome Marie Farrell

translation.en: was visited by Gardaí, given a questionnaire,
translation.it: ricevette la visita della Garda e un questionario.

translation.en: and one of the questions was, "Did you see Sophie Toscan du Plantier?"
translation.it: Una delle domande era: "Ha visto Sophie Toscan du Plantier?"

translation.en: And she said she'd been in her shop on Saturday 21st around three o'clock.
translation.it: Disse che era stata nel suo negozio sabato 21 circa alle 15:00.

translation.en: When Sophie left the shop, she'd seen this man across the road
translation.it: Quando uscì, vide un uomo dall'altro lato della strada,

translation.en: outside McCarthy Butchers on Main Street.
translation.it: fuori dal macellaio sulla via principale.

translation.en: Thought he looked a bit weird. Very long coat.
translation.it: Era strano. Aveva un cappotto lungo. LUNGO CAPPOTTO NERO

translation.en: He was standing across the road from my shop,
translation.it: Era di fronte al mio negozio

translation.en: and when she left the shop, he followed her down the street.
translation.it: e, quando è uscita dal negozio, lui l'ha seguita per strada.

translation.en: [Dwyer] He went from corner to corner, watching every place she went.
translation.it: Di angolo in angolo la seguiva con lo sguardo.

translation.en: Another word for it would be "stalking."
translation.it: Un sinonimo è "stalking".

translation.en: She didn't know who this guy was.
translation.it: Non lo conosceva.

translation.en: All these statements meant the Gardaí could trace
translation.it: Grazie a questa dichiarazione, la Garda ricostruì

translation.en: the last-known movements of Sophie Toscan du Plantier.
translation.it: gli ultimi movimenti noti di Sophie Toscan du Plantier.

translation.en: [reporter 25] The last-known pictures of Sophie Toscan du Plantier
translation.it: Le ultime foto note di Sophie Toscan du Plantier

translation.en: as she arrived in Cork Airport on December 20th.
translation.it: quando è arrivata all'aeroporto di Cork il 20 dicembre.

translation.en: [Smith] We have a feeling there may be somebody out there who has further information to give us,
translation.it: Crediamo che qualcuno là fuori possa fornirci altre informazioni,

translation.it: e, per chi sa quale motivo, ancora non si fa avanti.

translation.it: Salve e bentornati nello studio di Crimeline.

translation.en: This following reconstruction traces what happened
translation.it: Questa ricostruzione spiega ciò che è successo

translation.en: from the time Sophie Toscan du Plantier arrived in Cork
translation.it: a Sophie Toscan du Plantier dal suo arrivo a Cork

translation.en: until the morning…
translation.it: fino al mattino…

translation.en: [Anne] I was down in Schull, and it was all over the papers,
translation.it: Ero a Schull ed era su tutti i giornali,

translation.en: and quite a few people started to say, "You look so like Sophie."
translation.it: molti iniziarono a dirmi che assomigliavo a Sophie.

translation.en: A friend in film contacted me,
translation.it: Mi contattò un amico

translation.en: and he said, "These people are looking for somebody to do a reconstruction."
translation.it: e mi disse: "Stanno cercando attori per fare la ricostruzione".

translation.en: [reporter 26] Sophie arrived at Cork Airport…
translation.it: Sophie è atterrata a Cork venerdì…

translation.en: [Anne] Would I be interested?
translation.it: Ero interessata?

translation.en: I have no acting experience whatsoever.
translation.it: Non avevo esperienze di recitazione.

translation.en: I mean, it was watched by so many people.
translation.it: La videro così tante persone.

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.it: Grazie.

translation.en: People still associate me with that.
translation.it: Vengo ancora associata ad essa.

translation.en: There weren't any makeup artists.
translation.it: Non c'erano truccatori.

translation.en: What I had to do was put on a wig.
translation.it: Indossai una parrucca.

translation.en: I thought, "Oh my God, this is so amateur and terrible," to be honest with you.
translation.it: A dire il vero, pensai: "Che cosa poco professionale".

translation.en: [reporter 26] She made some purchases in Brosnan's Spar supermarket.
translation.it: Ha fatto acquisti al supermercato Spar di Brosnan.

translation.en: But I felt I was doing something positive.
translation.it: Ma mi sembrava qualcosa di positivo.

translation.en: [reporter 26] The next day, Sunday 22nd December, Sophie drove to Three Castle Head…
translation.it: Il giorno dopo, domenica 22 dicembre, Sophie andò a Three Castle Head…

translation.en: …and walked for around an hour in this area.
translation.it: e passeggiò per un'oretta nella zona.

translation.en: She then dropped in to Billy O'Sullivan's pub in Crookhaven.
translation.it: Poi passò al pub Billy O'Sullivan's a Crookhaven.

translation.en: She had tea there and spoke to some people in the bar.
translation.it: Prese il tè e conversò con alcuni degli avventori.

translation.en: [Anne] I suppose the most difficult part was probably driving up to the house.
translation.it: La parte più difficile fu arrivare alla casa.

translation.en: Everything was still quite fresh.
translation.it: Era ancora tutto molto fresco.

translation.en: [reporter 26] At six o'clock, lights were seen on in her house.
translation.it: Alle 18:00 le luci in casa erano accese.

translation.en: [Anne] And then to go into the house and know that three or four weeks ago
translation.it: E poi entrare in casa sapendo che tre o quattro settimane prima

translation.en: that this woman had come to her, um, her death in such a horrendous way.
translation.it: questa donna era morta in maniera trucida.

translation.en: [reporter 26] What happened over the intervening hours remains a mystery.
translation.it: Ciò che è successo nelle ore successive rimane un mistero.

translation.en: [Anne] I felt a kindredness towards her.
translation.it: La sentii vicina a me.

translation.en: That's the way I would see it.
translation.it: La vedevo così.

translation.en: I understood why she was down here,
translation.it: Capivo perché era qui,

translation.en: exactly what she loved about it.
translation.it: cosa amava del posto.

translation.en: [Toma] A woman died here,
translation.it: Una donna era morta qui

translation.en: and we somehow all felt responsible for that.
translation.it: e ci sentimmo tutti responsabili.

translation.en: But it didn't make sense to our experience of what West Cork was.
translation.it: Strideva con la nostra esperienza del West Cork.

translation.en: Nobody really knew how we all fitted into that,
translation.it: Nessuno sapeva cosa c'entrassimo con questa storia,

translation.en: how we thought about ourselves.
translation.it: cosa pensassimo di noi stessi.

translation.en: Twelve o'clock on Christmas Day, there's always a… a swim for charity.
translation.it: Il giorno di Natale, alle 12:00, c'è una nuotata per beneficenza.

translation.en: We always go down to the pier, and hundreds of people go down there, and it's a social sort of event.
translation.it: Si va al molo e centinaia di persone si tuffano in acqua. È un evento sociale.

translation.en: [Florence] The Christmas swim gets everyone together after Mass.
translation.it: La nuotata natalizia è dopo la messa.

translation.en: Obviously, everyone was aware of what was prevailing in the area
translation.it: Ovviamente, tutti sapevamo cosa fosse accaduto,

translation.en: but didn't quite grasp, actually, the enormity of what had happened.
translation.it: ma non ne capivamo l'enormità.

translation.en: I think everybody was coming to terms with it.
translation.it: Lo stavamo ancora metabolizzando.

translation.en: [Len] The murder was part of the conversation down there.
translation.it: Si iniziò a discutere dell'omicidio.

translation.en: And, uh, you start thinking about,
translation.it: E a pensare:

translation.en: "God," you know, "there is somebody that can do this horrible thing."
translation.it: "Dio, c'è qualcuno in grado di commettere un crimine orribile."

translation.en: "Are they living around here?"
translation.it: "Vive nei dintorni?"

translation.en: We were all afraid there was a murderer among us.
translation.it: Temevamo che ci fosse un assassino tra di noi.

translation.en: We were afraid of one another.
translation.it: Avevamo paura l'uno dell'altro.

translation.en: [Billy] People all around were scared.
translation.it: La gente aveva paura.

translation.en: You know, 'cause we never locked doors or anything.
translation.it: Non chiudevamo mai la porta a chiave.

translation.en: But people did lock doors.
translation.it: Ma iniziammo a farlo.

translation.en: [reporter 27] There's no denying
translation.it: È innegabile,

translation.en: foreign nationals have been affected by the killing.
translation.it: gli stranieri sono stati colpiti dall'omicidio.

translation.en: I feel scared, yes.
translation.it: Ho paura, sì.

translation.en: It's taken some of the beauty away, hasn't it?
translation.it: E ha portato via un po' di bellezza.

translation.en: [reporter 27] They dread to think anyone in such a close-knit area could've been involved.
translation.it: Non osano pensare che un membro di questa comunità unita sia coinvolto.

translation.en: That changed that whole atmosphere. Definitely.
translation.it: L'atmosfera cambiò. Decisamente.

translation.en: People were crawling through ideas of who were the weirdos.
translation.it: La gente si arrovellò il cervello per capire chi fosse strano.

translation.en: Who could this possibly be, this monster?
translation.it: Chi poteva essere quel mostro?

translation.en: I was thinking about how everybody had made it "the other."
translation.it: Mi resi contro che tutti iniziarono a parlare degli "altri".

translation.en: There were plenty of "others."
translation.it: E c'erano molti "altri".

translation.en: Blow-ins might have said, "It must have been
translation.it: I blow-in dicevano: "Sarà stato

translation.en: a repressed local farmer
translation.it: un contadino frustrato

translation.en: who needed sex."
translation.it: in cerca di sesso".

translation.en: And locals might have said,
translation.it: E la gente del posto diceva:

translation.en: "Oh, it must have been one of those hippie dope-smoking ones
translation.it: "Sarà stato uno di quegli hippie fattoni

translation.en: who needed sex."
translation.it: in cerca di sesso".

translation.en: The place is full of rumour and counter rumour,
translation.it: Circolano diverse voci

translation.en: and all sorts of theories have been bandied about.
translation.it: e si discute di ogni tipo di teoria.

translation.en: In my mind, I was trying to think of neighbours
translation.it: Io cercavo di pensare ai vicini,

translation.en: and various things and various people's lives.
translation.it: a varie cose e alla vita delle persone.

translation.en: You know, trying to analyse everybody,
translation.it: Cercavo di analizzare tutti,

translation.en: work out motives, and all sorts of stuff.
translation.it: capire eventuali moventi e così via.

translation.en: People are afraid, yeah, that there's somebody out there.
translation.it: La gente ha paura. C'è qualcuno là fuori.

translation.en: If it's somebody living in the area, they might do it again.
translation.it: Se è qualcuno del posto, potrebbe rifarlo.

translation.en: [woman 1] Don't let people into your home unless you're satisfied as to their identification.
translation.it: Non aprite la porta a nessuno a meno che non sappiate chi sia.

translation.en: If you're suspicious, ring the Gardaí immediately.
translation.it: Se nutrite qualche sospetto, chiamate subito la Garda.

translation.en: [Len] I did actually have a thought about somebody,
translation.it: Mi venne in mente qualcuno,

translation.en: and it kept going on in my mind, and I couldn't stop it at all. I…
translation.it: non riuscivo a togliermelo dalla testa…

translation.en: "Len, stop thinking about it. Stop thinking about it." you know?
translation.it: "Len, smetti di pensarci."

translation.en: And in the end,
translation.it: E alla fine,

translation.en: it was just playing on my mind. I went to the guards, and I told them.
translation.it: andai dalla Garda e condivisi la mia idea.

translation.en: I did feel really strange having thoughts about other people
translation.it: Mi sembrò stranissimo avere questi pensieri riguardo agli altri

translation.en: you know, when you have no proof.
translation.it: senza avere prove.

translation.en: Your mind goes off into ridiculous places, you know,
translation.it: La mente vaga verso mete impensate,

translation.en: and I wasn't the only person to behave like that.
translation.it: ma non fui l'unico.

translation.en: [Smith] Sophie was murdered
translation.it: 11 GENNAIO 1997 Sophie è morta tra le 23:00 di domenica e le 10:00 del mattino seguente.

translation.en: between 11 p.m. on Sunday night and 10 a.m. the following morning.
translation.it: Sophie è morta tra le 23:00 di domenica e le 10:00 del mattino seguente.

translation.en: We would ask anybody who was driving a car on that night
translation.it: Chiediamo a tutti coloro che erano in auto quella notte

translation.en: to let us know if they saw anything unusual.
translation.it: di farci sapere se avete visto qualcosa di insolito.

translation.en: And then on 11th January, there was this major development in the case.
translation.it: Poi, l'11 gennaio, ci fu una svolta nel caso.

translation.en: [Barry] The Gardaí received a phone call from a call box
translation.it: La Garda ricevette una telefonata da una cabina

translation.en: from a woman calling herself Fiona
translation.it: da parte di una donna di nome Fiona

translation.en: saying she'd seen a man at Kealfadda Bridge
translation.it: che diceva di aver visto un uomo al ponte di Kealfadda

translation.en: around 3 a.m.
translation.it: intorno alle 3:00

translation.en: on the morning of the 23rd, when Sophie was murdered.
translation.it: la mattina del 23, quando Sophie fu uccisa.

translation.en: Chief Superintendent Noel Smith made an appeal to Fiona to contact them.
translation.it: Il Sovrintendente capo Noel Smith chiese a Fiona di contattarli.

translation.en: Now, you particularly want to address yourself to somebody here.
translation.it: Vuole rivolgersi a una persona in particolare.

translation.en: The caller made a phone call to Bandon Garda Station.
translation.it: Chi ha chiamato la stazione della Garda di Bandon

translation.en: That caller gave us certain information
translation.it: dandoci determinate informazioni

translation.en: which we think could be critical in… in solving this murder,
translation.it: che pensiamo possano essere decisive per risolvere il caso.

translation.en: and I am making a direct appeal to that person tonight to ring me here.
translation.it: Mi rivolgo direttamente a quella persona affinché mi richiami stasera.

translation.en: Please, if you're watching, or if you know who did make that phone call,
translation.it: Se ci stai guardando o se sai chi ha fatto la telefonata,

translation.en: do get in touch.
translation.it: contattaci.

translation.en: [Barry] She rang again the day afterwards
translation.it: Ritelefonò il giorno seguente

translation.en: from a call box in Leap in West Cork, again using the alias Fiona.
translation.it: da una cabina a Leap, nel West Cork, ancora con lo pseudonimo di Fiona.

translation.en: [Dwyer] When the Fiona thing started,
translation.it: Quando iniziò la storia di Fiona,

translation.en: we thought, "Why doesn't she come forward?"
translation.it: ci chiedemmo perché non si facesse avanti.

translation.en: "There must be a reason she doesn't come forward."
translation.it: "Dev'esserci un motivo."

translation.en: [Diane] She was married,
translation.it: Era sposata

translation.en: and she shouldn't have been there with another man.
translation.it: e non avrebbe dovuto essere lì con un altro.

translation.en: We were all telling her
translation.it: Le dicemmo tutti

translation.en: that obviously this poor lady's life had gone,
translation.it: che quella povera signora era morta

translation.en: you know, so she should give her statement
translation.it: e avrebbe dovuto testimoniare

translation.en: regardless of the consequences to herself.
translation.it: a prescindere dalle conseguenze per lei stessa.

translation.en: [Barry] And she rang again on the 24th,
translation.it: E richiamò il 24,

translation.en: third phone call as Fiona.
translation.it: per la terza volta.

translation.en: But on this occasion, she made it from her home phone in Schull.
translation.it: Ma, in quell'occasione, chiamò dal telefono di casa a Schull.

translation.en: Gardaí traced it.
translation.it: La Garda la rintracciò.

translation.en: Fiona was Marie Farrell.
translation.it: Fiona era Marie Farrell.

translation.en: [producer] What did you see on the night of 23rd December?
translation.it: Cos'ha visto la notte del 23 dicembre?

translation.en: I was driving from Goleen to Schull,
translation.it: Stavo andando da Goleen a Schull

translation.en: and I saw a man walking along the bridge, just along here.
translation.it: e ho visto un uomo che camminava sul ponte.

translation.en: he appeared to be in a drunken state and waving his arms around.
translation.it: Sembrava ubriaco e agitava le braccia.

translation.en: She said he was wearing a long, black coat and looking up at the sky,
translation.it: Disse che indossava un lungo cappotto nero e guardava il cielo.

translation.en: and he was totally dishevelled and seemed to be out of it.
translation.it: Era spettinato e sembrava fuori di sé.

translation.en: All the things of somebody that has totally and utterly lost it.
translation.it: Mostrava tutti i segni di uno che è andato fuori di testa.

translation.en: [Barry] But then she was in Brosnan's supermarket in Schull later in January,
translation.it: A gennaio, mentre era al supermercato di Brosnan a Schull,

translation.en: and she saw the man again.
translation.it: rivide quell'uomo.

translation.en: [producer] "Oh my God, that's the man I saw on the road."
translation.it: "Oddio, è l'uomo che ho visto sulla strada."

translation.en: I would've said that to myself.
translation.it: L'avrei detto a me stessa.

translation.en: I went into the shop. I bent down to get the paper.
translation.it: Entrai nel negozio, mi piegai un attimo.

translation.en: I looked up, and there he was.
translation.it: Mi rialzai ed era lì.

translation.en: I dropped the paper and left the shop because I knew the guards were in the street.
translation.it: Mollai tutto e uscii perché sapevo che c'era la Garda in strada.

translation.en: [Barry] She'd seen this man at Kealfadda Bridge
translation.it: Aveva visto l'uomo al ponte di Kealfadda la notte dell'omicidio

translation.en: the night Sophie was murdered and said, "That's the man."
translation.it: Aveva visto l'uomo al ponte di Kealfadda la notte dell'omicidio e disse: "È lui".

translation.en: When I pointed the man out to the Gardaí,
translation.it: Quando ho indicato l'uomo agli agenti,

translation.en: they told me
translation.it: mi hanno detto

translation.en: that his name was Ian Bailey.
translation.it: che si chiamava Ian Bailey.
